headline: The Trumps Are in Talks to Reclaim Their Prized D.C. Hotel
summary: The family firm is looking for a hotel in Washington as Trump prepares to return to the White House.

raw.headline: The Trumps Are in Talks to Reclaim Their Prized D.C. Hotel
raw.summary: The family firm is looking for a hotel in Washington as Trump prepares to return to the White House.

headline: Hilton Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Earnings Release Date
summary: MCLEAN, Va., January 10, 2025--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) will report fourth quarter and full year 2024 financial results before the stock market opens on Thursday, Feb. 6, 2025, followed by a conference call at 9 a.m. EST. Christopher J. Nassetta, president & chief executive officer, Hilton, and Kevin Jacobs, chief financial officer & president, global development, Hilton, will discuss the company's performance and lead a question-and-answer session.

headline: Trump Organization in talks to repurchase Washington DC hotel lease, WSJ reports
summary: President-elect Donald Trump's company is in negotiations to repurchase the lease on a hotel in Washington D.C. it used to own, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with...
